original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)🔽18.12. Hetusahetukaduka, Hetuduka🔽Hetuñceva sahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu sa hetuka duka hetu duka  hetum ca iva sa hetukam hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽In accordance with the True Idea, and contrary to the True Idea, and the Schedule of Questions in Pairs🔽The Section on Causes and Effects in Pairs, the Section on Causes

original: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum na hetum dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na ca hetu na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
